data.name: Tux and Fanny
data.detailed_description:
When you take a closer look, everything is an adventure.

Tux and Fanny just want to play soccer but their soccer ball is deflated. Go on an epic adventure to help them inflate their ball. Play as both Tux and Fanny as well as a cat and a flea. All four characters will have to work together if you’re going to inflate the ball.

Play a multitude of diverse mini-games which you'll collect as you progress through your journey, each with their own unique rewards. There are secrets hidden at every turn in the world of Tux and Fanny. Can you find them all?
data.about_the_game:
When you take a closer look, everything is an adventure.

Tux and Fanny just want to play soccer but their soccer ball is deflated. Go on an epic adventure to help them inflate their ball. Play as both Tux and Fanny as well as a cat and a flea. All four characters will have to work together if you’re going to inflate the ball.

Play a multitude of diverse mini-games which you'll collect as you progress through your journey, each with their own unique rewards. There are secrets hidden at every turn in the world of Tux and Fanny. Can you find them all?
data.short_description: A retro-inspired adventure puzzle game featuring 4 playable characters with interwoven storylines. Explore the natural (and unnatural) world for unique interactions and collect a vast inventory to aid you in your quest. There's nothing as simultaneously charming and strange as Tux and Fanny.
data.reviews:
“Tux and Fanny is unique and gorgeous: a strange treasure.”
4/5 – The Guardian

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
